headline: Duke Energy Grants And Tax AI Efforts Frame Valuation Debate
summary: Duke Energy Foundation has awarded $500,000 in workforce development grants to North Carolina community colleges, targeting skilled trades programs. Duke Energy is participating as an early user in KPMG's new Tax AI Accelerator Program, focused on applying artificial intelligence to tax compliance. Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK), recently trading at $123.41, is pairing community investment with technology adoption in ways that can matter for long term operations. The $500,000 in workforce grants...
